name: BIONICLE: Kapura Adventures
description:
Sometimes to move fast, you have to move very

Very

Very

Slowly.

 

ONE MATORAN

Step into the shoes of the iconic Matoran Kapura in his quest to move as fast as he can. BIONICLE: Kapura Adventures features high-octane gameplay the likes of which you’ve never seen before. Discover the secrets of the island with more than 2 collectibles to unlock, and join Kapura as he undertakes his biggest challenge yet.

 

ONE ADVENTURE

Rediscover for the first time the island of Mata Nui you already know and love from Masks of Power: Legacy. You’ll travel through the fiery landscape of Ta-Wahi, the frigid mountains of Ko-wahi, the scorching deserts of Po-Wahi, and many more. Take in the sights and sounds of Mata Nui from a brand new, much shorter perspective.

Experience the game that critics are praising as the first major step forward for the video game industry in over 70 years.
